about_the_game:
Withering Rooms is a challenging 2.5D horror RPG set in a procedurally generated Victorian mansion that changes each night.

In this demo, you'll get to:
* Explore the ground floor and basement of Mostyn House
* Defeat a host of undead and offer their organs in ritual to level up
* Gather weapons, distractions, magical artifacts, keys, and crafting materials
* Cast a wide variety of devious spells - create hex traps on closet doors, enchant suits of armor to assist you, or create a decoy mimic of yourself
* Meet a cast of strange friends, merchants, liars, and witches each with their own agenda
* Defeat the first boss of the game - the deadly Butcher Surgeon

Your progress carries directly into the full game.
